name: Equinox - The Keepers Of Time
description:
Since the beginning of time a brother and a sister - by some called the keepers of time have watched over the Tower of Time located in a temple somewhere far away. On the very top of the tower is the perpetual calendar, it maintains time continuum. 

Through a rip in time - a strong energy beam has destroyed the perpetual calendar, scattering it’s pieces around the temple. By that, the time continuum got disrupted. The Keepers of Time try everything in their power to restore the time continuum

You play two characters. One is able to do parkour while the other one has to solve puzzles. Their actions are influencing each others timelines. Try to leverage their abilities to gather the scattered pieces of the perpetual calendar to restore time continuum.

Made for Epic MegaJam 2020 

Team: Equinox 

Game Design & Programming: Petro Stasiv  ptrstasiv@gmail.com

Programming: Matan Ellhayani stylematan@gmail.com

Sound Design & Music Composition: Alex Campan alex.campan@outlook.com
